title: Hummus on herb and sesame salad

For the hummus: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the hummus, place the chickpeas, garlic, lemon juice and olive oil in to a small food processor and blend together until smooth. Season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
For the salad, mix the parsley leaves with the sesame seeds and olive oil and arrange on a plate.
To serve, spoon the hummus on top of the salad and serve with chargrilled bread.
